Name: Swat
Description: If the Bear is awake, deal 2 damage to one enemy.

Name: Flatten
Description: Deal 2 damage to one enemy. If you are damaging an encounter card, also blank each of its effects until tomorrow.

Name: Mark Territory
Description: Rotate two hero cards among those on your field and your partner's field.

Name: Claw
Description: Deal 2 damage to one enemy. If the Bear is awake, deal 4 damage instead.

Name: Intimidate
Description:
If the Bear is awake, deal 3 damage to one enemy.
Otherwise, remove 3 ⏳ from one duration.

Name: Bear Down
Description:
If the Bear is awake, deal 6 damage to one enemy.
Otherwise, rotate between one and six hero cards among those on your field and on your partner's field.
